intro_text: You're a bit too curious for your own good, aren't you?
decline_text: With a shake of your head, you manage to wake yourself up, sitting up in your nest with a gasp.

success_outcomes.text: There's nothing for you here... yet!

fail_outcomes.text: There's nothing for you here... yet!

antag_fail_outcomes.text: Your search leads to nothing... But that will change in the future!

antag_success_outcomes.text: Your search leads to nothing... But that will change in the future!
